quizlist.question: A continuous watertight bulkhead on a MODU may also be a/an_____________.?
The test of metals which measures the resistance of the metal to impact is called____________.?
The dead center of a lathe can be properly used only after the end of the work piece has been __________.?
In machine shop practice, a center gauge is used for checking the angle of______________ .?
To safely change spindle speeds on a lathe, you must first __________.
quizlist.option2: do it as the rotation runs slowly

quizlist.question: Which of the metals listed below can be cut with the highest operating lathe speed?
What type of gasket is used on high pressure steam flange joints?
A follower rest should be used with a lathe to machine __________.?
All portable electric tools should have a ground connection to prevent __________.?
quizlist.option1: electric shock if the tool is shorted

quizlist.question: A compound Bourdon tube type pressure gauge is capable of measuring __________.?
Ferrous metals are metals containing __________.?
Work that cannot readily be mounted between lathe centers is usually held in a __________.?
A compound gage is used for measuring pressures both above and below __________.?
When a lathe is used for thread cutting, the number of threads per inch produced is determined by the speed relationship between the __________.?
quizlist.option1: lead screw and head stock spindle

quizlist.question: Which of the listed metals can usually be drilled without lubrication?
In machine shop practice, a center gauge is used for checking the angle of______________ .?
Which of the following describes the purpose of a striker or doubler plate?
quizlist.option1: Provides landing surface for the sounding bob of a tank sounding
quizlist.option2: Produces vacuum pressure in the pump
quizlist.option3: serves as measuring tools for tank sounding

quizlist.question: Which of the devices is commonly used in measuring the clearances between the main engine bearings and the crankshaft?
When steel, cast iron, or other metals with surface scale are being turned, the first roughing cut should be taken __________.?
quizlist.option1: deep enough to get under the scale
quizlist.option3: lightly to avoid dulling the tool

quizlist.question: Regarding MODU construction, bulkheads in the quarters are generally?
An allowance may be made for expansion and contraction in piping with the use of expansion joints or_________.?
quizlist.option1: bends or loops in the line

quizlist.question: The dead center of a lathe can be properly used only after the end of the work piece has been __________.?
A tool used for measuring or laying out angles is called a_______.?
A record of the types and strengths of steels used on a MODU is called ______.?
Which of the nondestructive testing methods listed is most often used to accurately detect external defects in welded metals?
To commence cutting threads with a metal lathe, you should engage the __________.?
To safely change spindle speeds on a lathe, you must first __________.?
Joints in pipelines must be properly aligned before they are connected because __________.?
quizlist.option1: excessive strain on the joints will result if they are misaligned
quizlist.option3: condensate accumulates rapidly when flanges are not properly aligned

quizlist.question: The most accurate method of measuring the setting of an inside caliper is to use a/an __________.?
Before power to a lathe is turned on, it is a good shop practice to first hand feed the carriage to ensure __________.?
quizlist.option1: all locking devices have been released

quizlist.question: To commence cutting threads with a metal lathe, you should engage the __________.?
A compound gage is used for measuring pressures both above and below __________.?
Before power to a lathe is turned on, it is a good shop practice to first hand feed the carriage to ensure __________.?
quizlist.option1: all locking devices have been released

quizlist.question: The operation of machining a uniformly roughened or checked surface on round stock in a lathe is called __________.?

The test of metals which measures the resistance of the metal to impact is called____________.?

quizlist.option2: do it as the rotation runs slowly
